title: Pixel 3xl no power
content:
Signed google pixel 3xl contract with Vodafone UK via carphone warehouse last week. All ready for my 60th birthday trip to Singapore, Australia and Vietnam over next 3 weeks. Delighted with the phone. 
UNTIL today. 
On recharging from zero it seems to be stuck in an 80 second loop of recharge, start up, shutdown that I can't interrupt. 
Software issue??
Several LONG web chats and phone calls to Vodafone and carphone warehouse today tell me they can't fix it remotely and don't have a link up to any Singapore outlet. Unbelievable...
Also I don't have a walk away option as I'm away for three weeks 
I'm a Google lover. But NOT impressed with status...
Any help or suggestions? 
Maybe I'll go back to iPhone....
